verses.roman:
rāmabhadrācārya, āra oḍhra siṁheśvara
tapana ācārya, āra raghu, nīlāmbara

synonyms: rāmabhadrācārya—of the name Rāmabhadra Ācārya; āra—and; oḍhra—resident of Orissa; siṁheśvara—of the name Siṁheśvara; tapana ācārya—of the name Tapana Ācārya; āra raghu—and another Raghunātha; nīlāmbara—of the name Nīlāmbara.
translation: Among the devotees who lived with Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu at Jagannātha Purī, Rāmabhadra Ācārya was the twenty-sixth, Siṁheśvara the twenty-seventh, Tapana Ācārya the twenty-eighth, Raghunātha the twenty-ninth and Nīlāmbara the thirtieth.
